numpy.description: Library numerical computation and N-dimensional arrays, mostly used in preprocessing.

pandas.description: Library for data analysis and manipulation, mostly used in preprocessing to create dataframes.

matplotlib.description: Library to create visualizations of data, mostly used for graphing.

sklearn.description: Machine learning framework, built on NumPy, mostly used for model training and evaluation.

tensorflow.description: Machine learning framework based on tensors, mostly used for model training and evaluation.

pytorch.description: Machine learning frameork based on tensors, mostly used for model trainng and evaluation.
